Module it.polimi.ingsw.am38

Package it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Network.Client

package it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Network.Client
  • Class
    Description
    ClientCommandInterpreter
    This class parse the input to let the server do what's needed based on the type of connection of the client
    ClientDATA
    Class that contains all the data of the client
    ClientInterface
    This interface is implemented from the ClientRMI
    ClientPingerThread
    Thread that answer the ping of the thread
    ClientRMI
    This is the class for those clients who decide to connect via RMI
    CLIENTSTARTER
    This is the main client class that create the clients thread based on the connection chosen
    ClientWriter
    Class that works in parallel to "listen" the text from the user
    CommonClientInterface
    Interface implemented by both TCPClient and ClientRMI
    ParserTCP
    ClientMessageSorter is a class that allow the division of the message came from the server
    TCPClient
    Class that represents the client TCP
    TimerThread
    Thread used as a timer to check if the client is still connected
